name: Satoshi Nakamoto
title: Creator of Bitcoin
excerpt: It might make sense just to get some in case it catches on. If enough people think the same way, that becomes a self fulfilling prophecy.

name: Chamath Palihapitiya
title: SocialCapital Founder and CEO
article: Chamath Palihapitiya, former facebook executive speaks about Bitcoin.

name: Michael Saylor
title: MicroStrategy $MSTR Founder, Chairman & CEO
article: MicroStrategy Adopts Bitcoin as Primary Treasury Reserve Asset
excerpt: Our investment in Bitcoin is part of our new capital allocation strategy, which seeks to maximize long-term value for our shareholders
